languages.text: Никто не знает, скольких врагов в жизни встретил Маражай, но известно, кто был его последним соперником. Когда он покинул свиту Вольного Торговца, ничто больше не мешало ему испытать воительницу вызвавшую его любопытство — Висиря Кибеллу, танцующую с клинками. А ей — исполнить волю Неумирающего и истребить ксеноса. Годами они изучали друг друга из теней и тщательно готовились к этой схватке. Их танец случился на отдаленном мире и щедро оросил его поверхность кровью. Неведомо, кто победил в той схватке, ибо кто бы ни одержал верх, он более не являл свое лицо Простору Коронус.

Not a soul knows how many enemies Marazhai faced in his lifetime, but what is known is the name of his last opponent. Once he had left the Rogue Trader's retinue, there was nothing to stop him from testing the warrior that had long since caught his curiosity — Vizsier Kibellah, the bladedancer. In turn, there was nothing to stop her from executing the Undying Emperor's will by exterminating the xenos. Both spent years preparing for this fight, studying each other from the shadows. Their dance took place on a remote world, and bountiful was the offering of blood it left upon the surface. The victor of that battle never appeared in the Koronus Expanse again, and thus the outcome remains unknown.

languages.text: No se sabe a cuántos enemigos se enfrentó Marazhai a lo largo de su vida, pero lo que sí se conoce es el nombre de su última adversaria. Cuando por fin abandonó el séquito {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, ya no había nada que le impidiese poner a prueba a la guerrera que había despertado su curiosidad: la visir Kibellah, la hoja danzante. En cuanto a ella, nada había tampoco que le impidiese ejecutar la voluntad del Emperador Inmortal exterminando al xenos. Los dos se prepararon para el combate durante años, estudiándose mutuamente desde las sombras. Su baile final tuvo lugar en un mundo lejano cuya superficie regaron con una copiosa ofrenda de sangre derramada. Se desconoce el desenlace de aquel duelo, pues quienquiera que venciese no volvió a dejarse ver en la Extensión de Koronus.

languages.text: マラズハイが生涯で何人の敵と対峙したかは誰も知らないが、最後の対戦相手の名前は知られている。一旦、自由開拓者の従者を離れた時、かねてから彼の好奇心をとらえていた戦士、ブレードダンサーのヴィジール・キベラを試すのを止めるものはなかった。逆に、異種族を絶滅させるという不死の皇帝の意志を実行する彼女を止めるものは何もなかった。両者はこの戦いのために何年も準備に費やし、影から互いを研究していた。彼らのダンスは辺境の世界で行われ、地表には豊かな血の供物が残された。その戦いの勝者がコロヌス・エクスパンスに姿を現すことは二度となかった。つまり、戦の結果は知られてはいないのだ。
languages.original_text: Not a soul knows how many enemies Marazhai faced in his lifetime, but what is known is the name of his last opponent. Once he had left the Rogue Trader's retinue, there was nothing to stop him from testing the warrior that had long since caught his curiosity — Vizsier Kibellah, the bladedancer. The victor of that battle never appeared in the Koronus Expanse again, and thus the outcome remains unknown.

traits.locale_text: マラズハイが生涯で何人の敵と対峙したかは誰も知らないが、最後の対戦相手の名前は知られている。一旦、自由開拓者の従者を離れた時、かねてから彼の好奇心をとらえていた戦士、ブレードダンサーのヴィジール・キベラを試すのを止めるものはなかった。逆に、異種族を絶滅させるという不死の皇帝の意志を実行する彼女を止めるものは何もなかった。両者はこの戦いのために何年も準備に費やし、影から互いを研究していた。彼らのダンスは辺境の世界で行われ、地表には豊かな血の供物が残された。その戦いの勝者がコロヌス・エクスパンスに姿を現すことは二度となかった。つまり、戦の結果は知られてはいないのだ。

languages.text: 没人知道玛拉斋一生中面对过多少位敌人，但所有人都知道他面对的最后一个对手是谁。当玛拉斋离开了行商浪人的队伍之后，他再也无法克制自己的欲望，前去寻找那位激起了他好奇心的战士——刀锋舞者宿老绮贝菈。同样，也没有任何东西可以能阻止绮贝菈消灭玛拉斋，行使不死神皇的意志。为了这场决斗，两人都花了许多年时间进行准备，在阴影中研究着彼此的战斗风格。他们的血腥之舞在某个遥远的世界爆发，决斗场鲜血四溅。在那之后，决斗的胜利者再也没有出现在科罗努斯扩区，因此也没人知道究竟是谁获得了最终的胜利。
languages.original_text: Not a soul knows how many enemies Marazhai faced in his lifetime, but what is known is the name of his last opponent. Once he had left the Rogue Trader's retinue, there was nothing to stop him from testing the warrior that had long since caught his curiosity — Vizsier Kibellah, the bladedancer. Their dance took place on a remote world, and bountiful was the offering of blood it left upon the surface. The victor of that battle never appeared in the Koronus Expanse again, and thus the outcome remains unknown.

languages.text: Niemand weiß, wie vielen Gegnern Marazhai in seinem Leben gegenüberstand, aber jeder kennt den Namen seiner letzten Gegnerin. Nachdem er das Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} verlassen hatte, ließ er sich durch nichts davon abhalten, die Kriegerin herauszufordern, die schon lange seine Neugier geweckt hatte ... Wesir Kibellah, die Klingentänzerin. Gleichzeitig ließ diese sich durch nichts davon abhalten, dem Willen des Todlosen Imperators Genüge zu tun und den Xenos zu vernichten. Beide bereiteten sich jahrelang auf diesen Kampf vor und studierten sich gegenseitig aus den Schatten. Ihr Tanz fand auf einer abgelegenen Welt statt, deren Oberfläche mit reichlich Blut getränkt wurde. Da der Sieger dieses Kampfes nie in die Koronus-Ausdehnung zurückkehrte, ist sein Ausgang bis heute unbekannt.
languages.original_text: Not a soul knows how many enemies Marazhai faced in his lifetime, but what is known is the name of his last opponent. languages.text: Nul ne sait combien d'ennemis Marazhai affronta au cours de sa vie, mais ce que l'on sait en revanche, c'est le nom de son ultime adversaire. Après qu'il eut quitté l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, plus rien ni personne ne pouvait l'empêcher de se mesurer à la guerrière qui avait depuis si longtemps attisé sa curiosité, la danselame Kibellah, vizir de son état. Quant à cette dernière, elle ne demandait qu'à exécuter la volonté de l'Immortel en abattant le xénos honni. Tous deux passèrent de longues années à se préparer à ce combat, s'épiant mutuellement depuis les ombres. Leur danse eut lieu sur un monde reculé, et l'offrande de sang versée à sa surface lors de cette rencontre fatidique fut plus qu'abondante. Le vainqueur ne remit plus jamais les pieds dans les Étendues de Koronus, si bien qu'on ignore encore son identité à ce jour.
languages.original_text: Not a soul knows how many enemies Marazhai faced in his lifetime, but what is known is the name of his last opponent. Once he had left the Rogue Trader's retinue, there was nothing to stop him from testing the warrior that had long since caught his curiosity — Vizsier Kibellah, the bladedancer. In turn, there was nothing to stop her from executing the Undying Emperor's will by exterminating the xenos. Both spent years preparing for this fight, studying each other from the shadows. languages.text: Marazhai'ın ömrü boyunca ne kadar düşmanla yüzleştiğini kimseler bilmez. Ancak bilinen tek isim, son rakibine aittir. Hür Tacir'in maiyetinden ayrıldığında uzun zamandır merakını cezbeden savaşçıyı, kılıç dansçısı Vezir Kibellah'yı teste tabi tutmaktan Marazhai'ı alıkoyacak hiçbir şey kalmamıştı. Karşılığında Kibellah'yı da zenoların kökünü kazıyarak Ölmeyen İmparator'un arzusunu yerine getirmekten alıkoyacak hiçbir şey kalmamıştı. Her ikisi de bu savaş için hazırlanarak ve gölgelerden birbirlerini inceleyerek yıllar geçirdi. Dansları, ırak bir dünyada gerçekleşti. Dansın toprağa bıraktığı kan adağıysa bereketliydi. O savaşın galibi, Koronus Enginliği'nde bir daha asla yüzünü göstermedi. Bundandır ki akıbeti asla bilinmedi.
languages.original_text: Not a soul knows how many enemies Marazhai faced in his lifetime, but what is known is the name of his last opponent. Once he had left the Rogue Trader's retinue, there was nothing to stop him from testing the warrior that had long since caught his curiosity — Vizsier Kibellah, the bladedancer.
